Package ParticleEngine.Particle

Class Particle

  • java.lang.Object
    • ParticleEngine.Particle.Particle
  • public class Particle
extends java.lang.Object
    The particle class is used internally and doesn't need to be referenced unless you are creating custom behaviors or interactions.
